commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
questo è inizio prova è davvero così facile?
sono cosi assetato....
---
wtf!
---
SEEEETEEEEEEE


?> Continua -> Dialogo1
name: Start

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice,)
signal(set,dialogo_prova,ESPRESISONE,)
ciao!
---
da quanto tempo mitico Kevin 
---
il kombini è esploso, sono tutta sporchina ihihi
---
almeno c'erano 7 litri di acqua in bottiglia haha 
sono riuscita a lavare le macchie sulla divisa
?> Continua ->Diag2
name: Dialogo1

commands_raw:
hai sete? prova con la fontana
nel parco anti-tossici

?> Continua -> Diag3
name: Diag2

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
ma cacchio, 7 litri di preziosa acqua....
non mi resta che andare al parco anti-tossici
---
a bere dalla fontana anti-tossici
name: Diag3

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_name,null)
signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
signal(set,background,bg_bed_room)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

Wow... it's so fun playing these games haha
---
The Skirat Games are the best!
---
Alright, after all that nerding,
I'm really thirsty. 
Time to get a drink!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
    signal(set,background,bg_entrance_house)
    -> Fridge_scene
}
name: House_scene_start

commands_raw:
Ugh, what a pain...
---
signal(set,pg_expression,sad)
Oh crap... right 
---
I ran out of water bottles.
---
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
I need to remember to buy some.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,backgrounds,sink_bg)
    -> sink_scene
}
name: Fridge_scene

commands_raw:
oh well, guess I'll settle for good old tap water.
---
Hey, why isn't it working? 
---
Crap, crap, crap!
---
No, I'm way too THIRSTY
---
I can't hold out.
---
I'll have to do it AGAIN...
?> Continua{
    signal(set,background,bg_bath_room)
    -> Bath_scene
}
name: Sink_scene

commands_raw:
I CAN'T BELIEVE IT!
---
How is this possible? The toilet's dry?!
---
Sigh, guess I'll have to go to the 24-hour konbini.
---
I wonder if Alice still works there.
---
I'm not really the type to leave the house,
but oh well, it's just some water...
---
Nothing can go wrong.
?> Continua{
    signal(set,scenes,res://Levels/Level_city/level_city.tscn)
}
name: Bath_scene

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
signal(set,npc_name,Alice)
signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
signal(set,background,bg_bed_room)
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
signal(set,background,bg_bed_room)

Hey, hi Kevin! How’s it going?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    
    ->kombini_1
}
name: Konbini_scene_start

commands_raw:
Uhm... 
---
Uhm... hi Alice. I’m fine I guess...
---
I just forgot that today was the
TOTALLY NORMAL civil war
between Eastside and Westside...
---
I have no idea what today’s reason is.
---
But uhh...
---
signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
what happened here?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_2
}
name: kombini_1

commands_raw:
Oh, you mean the konbini?
---
Oh, you mean the konbini? Dunno, it exploded.
Maybe a gas leak? Who knows, hehe.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    ->kombini_3
}
name: kombini_2

commands_raw:
Oh…
---
okay.
---
Is there any chance you have some water?
---
I’m dying of thirst!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_4
}
name: kombini_3

commands_raw:
Damn, Kev, I just used the last bottles
to wash my uniform.
---
signal(set,npc_expression,sad)
It got dirty during the evacuation
-there was a nasty stain, haha.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    ->kombini_5
}
name: kombini_4

commands_raw:
You mean those empty bottles over there?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_6
}
name: kombini_5

commands_raw:
Yep! Exactly those!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,pg_expression,angry)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    ->kombini_7
}
name: kombini_6

commands_raw:
....
---
Alice.....

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_8
}
name: kombini_7
kombini_8

commands_raw:
That’s like... 
---
at least 10 liters!!!
---
signal(set,npc_expression,sad)
Are you telling me you used that holy,
---
incredible,
---
delicious water..
---
 just for a stain???

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    ->kombini_10
}
name: kombini_9

commands_raw:
Hey! It was a REALLY stubborn stain!
Look
---
it’s still there!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    ->kombini_11
}
name: kombini_10

commands_raw:
THAT'S NOT A STAIN!
---
It's a patch!!!
---
You put it on last month when
you tore your uniform!
---
I remember!!!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_12
}
name: kombini_11

commands_raw:
Ohhh, so THAT’S why it wouldn’t come off!
---
HAHAHA what a fail, LOL!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,sad)
    ->kombini_13
}
name: kombini_12

commands_raw:
My water...
---
My thirst...
---
Thirst...
---
THIRST!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_14
}
name: kombini_13

commands_raw:
If you're that thirsty
---
I’ve got the perfect solution for you!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)

    ->kombini_15
}
name: kombini_14
kombini_15

commands_raw:
Just go drink from the
Nohobos Park fountain,
duh!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_17
}
name: kombini_16

commands_raw:
But..
---
the fountain is on the OTHER SIDE
of the city!!!
---
I’d have to go all the way back,
---
and I really don’t feel like getting hit
with more money and potatoes.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,sad)
    ->kombini_18
}
name: kombini_17

commands_raw:
Silly!
---
Just take the shortcut 
signal(set,background,bg_bath_room)
through the Foul Forest!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_19
}
name: kombini_18

commands_raw:
Wait, that’s its real name?
---
Our city is so weird...
---
But is that forest really a
shortcut to the park?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_20
}
name: kombini_19

commands_raw:
Yeah! 
---
Just follow this path and go straight,
---
you’ll pop out right in front of the fountain.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,npc_name,null)
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    ->kombini_21
}
name: kombini_20

commands_raw:
Mmmh, I don’t know...
---
but I have no other choice, 
---
I’m way too thirsty.
---
Oh well, a walk in the woods is easy.
---
Nothing can go wrong.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,scenes,res://Levels/Level_forest/level_forest.tscn)
}
name: kombini_21

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_name,null)
signal(set,background,bg_bed_room)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

What the hell were those green dwarves?
---
Finally, I made it out.
---
Now, fountain, I'm almost th—"

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,???)
    signal(set,npc_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
    
    ->park_1
}
name: Park_scene_start

commands_raw:
Stop right there, young civilian!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
    
    ->park_2
}
name: park_1

commands_raw:
Huh? 
---
W-Who are you?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,???)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
    
    ->park_3
}
name: park_2

commands_raw:
I’m Sergeant Spatocco Buddington,
---
but they call me Buddy..
signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    
    ->park_4
}
name: park_3

commands_raw:
The military? 
---
What are soldiers doing in our city?
---
And especially in our anti-hobos park???

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    
    ->park_5
}
name: park_4

commands_raw:
That’s classified, young civilian. 

---
But my private reported that you
just came out of the forest.
---
Did you notice anything strange there?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    
    ->park_6
}
name: park_5

commands_raw:
Yeah, 
---
a bunch of green dwarves were
shooting at me!!!
---
I’m so done with today—everyone’s
been throwing random stuff at me…  
---
anything except for a damn bottle of water.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
    
    ->park_7
}
name: park_6

commands_raw:
....
---
signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
So you saw them, huh… 
---
Listen here, boy… 
---
those creatures you saw in the forest… 
---
were actually...
---
ALIENS!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
    
    ->park_8
}
name: park_7

commands_raw:
Aliens???  
---
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
Damn, that’s nuts…
---
Oh well, I’ll leave that to you military fellas.
---
If you don’t mind, there’s
a fountain waiting for me!
---
Now, if you’ll excuse me—

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
    
    ->park_9
}
name: park_8

commands_raw:
Hold it right there, kid...
---
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
The fountain…
---
The fountain, unfortunately,
---
signal(set,npc_expression,angry)
was caught in the crossfire of those
damn green-skinned bastards.
---
signal(set,npc_expression,sad)
It… it didn’t make it.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
    
    ->park_10
}
name: park_9

commands_raw:
No... 
---
no... this can't be...
---
this can't be true!
---
signal(set,pg_expression,sad)
NOOOOO!
---
FOUNTAIN, NOOOOOO!
---
I...
---
I was too late.
---
signal(set,pg_expression,angry)
Aliens…
---
DAMN GREEN-SKINNED BASTARDS!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    ->park_11
}
name: park_10

commands_raw:
I like your spirit, kid, 
---
but try to calm down, alright?
---
Those green-skins are as cunning
as capybarasm and as
deadly as spiders.
---
But we’re short on personnel, so
any new recruit is welcome.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    
    
    ->park_12
}
name: park_11

commands_raw:
You son of a bitch... I’m in.
---
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
If possible, though, I’d really like
some water now.
---
Do you have any supplies?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
    
    ->park_13
}
name: park_12

commands_raw:
Unfortunately not, kid. 

---
All our water crates were stolen, and it
seems the entire city is out too.
---
And of course, you know who’s responsible.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,angry)
    
    ->park_14
}
name: park_13

commands_raw:
ALIENS....
---
Sergeant, give me a weapon. 
---
It’s time to end this.
?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,angry)
    
    ->park_16
}
name: park_14
park_15

commands_raw:
We don’t have much, we’re low on funds… 
---
but here, take this.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    
    ->park_17
}
name: park_16

commands_raw:
This will do. 
---
Thanks, Sergeant.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,notthing)
    
    ->park_18
}
name: park_17

commands_raw:
...
---
signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
Wow, that kid’s not bad, huh?

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Soldier)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    
    ->park_19
}
name: park_18

commands_raw:
Sir, are you sure about letting him go alone? 
---
I mean, he has no idea what he’s getting into.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    
    ->park_20
}
name: park_19

commands_raw:
Let him have his revenge, private. 
---
His eyes burn  like molten metal,
best stay out of his way.
---
signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
...
---
signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
Oh well, break out the whiskey! 
---
We’ve earned a little break
before the next battle! 

?> Continua{
    signal(set,scenes,res://Levels/Alien_dialogue/alien_scene.tscn)
}
name: park_20

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_name,null)
signal(set,background,bg_cliffside)
signal(set,pg_expression,angry)
signal(set,npc_expression,idle)



Come on, aliens, show yourselves!
---
I know you're here!

?> Continua{
signal(set,npc_name,zugplup)
signal(set,dialogue_name,???)

->cliffside1
}
name: Cliffside_scene_start

commands_raw:
Odivapmi zzzzzz ertserret nu,
---
zzzzzz et adraug am

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)

->cliffside2
}
name: cliffside1
cliffside2

commands_raw:
My apologies, human, my zzzzz
translator was...
set in reverse zzzzz.

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
->cliffside4
}
name: cliffside3

commands_raw:
Are you the one in charge here?
---
You look uglier than the others.

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Zugplup)
->cliffside5
}
name: cliffside4

commands_raw:
Correct, human!
---
I am the great and fearsome ZUGPLUP
---
signal(set,background,bg_alianstorm)
pack leader of my hermit crabs!
---
And we are here for—

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
->cliffside6
}
name: cliffside5

commands_raw:
For what?!?
---
What are you here for?!?

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Zugplup)

->cliffside7
}
name: cliffside6

commands_raw:
Ahem… I was just about to say that human.
---
Cough cough.
---
Blah blah great and fearsome blah blah
---
pack leader of my hermit crabs
---
and we are here for… your water!


?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
->cliffside8
}
name: cliffside7

commands_raw:
Why??
---
Why do you want our water???

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Zugplup)
->cliffside9
}
name: cliffside8

commands_raw:
We want it simply because
we are greedy beings!
---
Through our intergalactic research,
---
we have discovered that water
from this planet.
---
is the moistest there is in the 
entire galaxy!
---
So we want it all for ourselves!

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
->cliffside10
}
name: cliffside9

commands_raw:
I won’t let you, Zuplug!!!
---
I’m here to defeat you!

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Zugplup)
signal(set,npc_expression,angry)
->cliffside11
}
name: cliffside10

commands_raw:
ZUGPLUP!!!
---
Very well, human, let’s see
what you’re capable of!
---
POWER UP THE SHIP!

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
->cliffside12
}
name: cliffside11

commands_raw:
Huh? The ship?
---
No… no! Hey—1v1! HEY!!!
---
That’s not fair!
---
What the hell, oh well… at least.
I’m armed, right?
---
I’m so damn thirsty…

?> Continua{
    signal(set,scenes,res://Levels/Level_boss/level_boss.tscn)
}
name: cliffside12

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,zugplup)
signal(set,npc_name,zugplup)
signal(set,background,bg_sunrise)
signal(set,pg_expression,angry)
signal(set,npc_expression,zugplupangry)

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,notthing)
signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)
->ending1
}
name: Ending_scene_start

commands_raw:
So… it’s finally over…
---
I did it!

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergentessurprise)
signal(set,pg_expression,surprise)

->ending2
}
name: ending1

commands_raw:
Damn, kid, not bad.
---
Not bad at all!

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergenteidle)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

->ending3

}
name: ending2

commands_raw:
Sergeant!
---
When did you get here?
?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergentespeack)
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)

->ending4

}
name: ending3

commands_raw:
Right when the ship started
firing like crazy.

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergenteidle)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

->ending5
}
name: ending4

commands_raw:
And you couldn’t help me?

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergentespeack)
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)

->ending6
}
name: ending5

commands_raw:
Ah, enough questions, kid!
You’ve WIN the war!
---
Now it’s time to celebrate with a nice,
refreshing glass of—

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergenteidle)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

->ending7
}
name: ending6

commands_raw:
Water! Yes! Finally!!!

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergentespeack)
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)

->ending8
}
name: ending7

commands_raw:
Whiskey!
Huh? Water?
---
Kid, you do realize the aliens
stole all the water, right?
?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergenteidle)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

->ending9
}
name: ending8

commands_raw:
Yeah, the same aliens I just
defeated a minute ago.

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Buddy)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergentespeack)
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)

->ending10
}
name: ending9

commands_raw:
And where do you think they
kept all their stolen goods?

?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergenteidle)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

->ending11
}
name: ending10

commands_raw:
In the… ship… that I…
just blew up…
?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,sergenteidle)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

->ending12
}
name: ending11

commands_raw:
signal(set,pg_expression,angry)
DAMN IT!!!!!!
---
signal(set,pg_expression,sad)
I just wanted some simple water,
---
why did everything
have to go this w—
?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
signal(set,npc_expression,alicesurprise)


->ending13
}
name: ending12

commands_raw:
Hey, Kev!!!!
---
I heard from the soldiers
what you did!!!
---
That was incredible!!!
?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_expression,aliceidle)


->ending14
}
name: ending13

commands_raw:
Sorry, Alice… but now’s
not the time.
---
I blew up the water… and now
I’m gonna die of thirst.
?> Continua{
signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
